name: Impact Health Sharing
statementOfFaith: Statement of Shared Beliefs & Ethics: belief that rights originate from God, all people created equal in God's likeness, principle taught by Christ to 'love thy neighbor' regardless of race/religion/creed, moral obligation to assist others in need.

preExisting.sharingLimits: Not shared during years 1-3, fully shareable after year 3. Exceptions: controlled hypertension and cholesterol may qualify immediately. Seniors 65+: no pre-existing limitations.

bestFor: Health-conscious individuals seeking affordable, digitally-driven sharing with wellness incentives and no provider network restrictions
pros: Wellness Rewards program lets members earn up to $150/month toward reducing their annual PRA
No provider network — freedom to see any doctor or hospital
No enrollment or renewal fees, and no rate increases in 5+ years
Unlimited free 24/7 telehealth and short-term teletherapy included
Senior-specific program (65+) with $1,000 PRA, no co-share, and no pre-existing condition limitations
cons: PRA minimums are relatively high ($2,500-$10,000) compared to other health shares
Three-year pre-existing condition waiting period — one of the longest in the industry
Not available in Rhode Island, Washington (New Jersey has tax penalty implications)
Dental and vision are discount programs only, not shared expenses
aiSummary: Impact Health Sharing is a modern, digitally-driven health sharing community founded in 2020 in Davie, FL with approximately 19,500 members. It uses dynamic pricing with 500+ unique price points based on age, household size, and PRA selection — starting from $73/month for individuals and $378/month for families. PRA options range from $2,500 to $10,000 with a 10% co-share capped at $5,000/household/year. No provider network (any doctor). Covers telehealth, prescriptions, maternity, mental health (limited), preventive care, emergency, and surgery. Unique Wellness Rewards program lets members earn up to $150/month. No rate increases for 5+ consecutive years. Three-year pre-existing condition waiting period (seniors 65+ exempt).
aiKeyFacts: No provider network — see any doctor
Wellness Rewards: earn up to $150/month toward PRA reduction
No enrollment fees, no rate increases in 5+ years
